I have been watching your videos for quite some time now. This is one of the most beautiful and inspirational videos you have ever made. Your videos are informative, funny, entertaining. But this one embodies your entire mission statement. The big thing we all want is people that have not experience the reality of how close we are and can be to the stars. And you one hundred percent again put that in perspective. We are in a critical time to publicize space. To further humanities existence and further our understandings of future technologies. I had a similar idea to this. And I hope someone can run with this. "Or maybe I'll just do it my self if no one else does it". But instead of putting rockets In rocket gardens or museums. Make a petition to put used rockets in town squares and around cities. Have private companies and NASA award historical rockets to city landscapes. So when humanity looks out its window it sees the reality of what we are and have been doing. Not of what we might be doing. Well done Tim Dodd.
